alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 11:24PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MADISON... FRANKLIN...SOUTHEASTERN CRAWFORD AND NORTHEASTERN SEBASTIAN COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CST... At 1124 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Alma, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Alma... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Altus... Denning... Rudy... Wiederkehr Village... Cass... Fern... Kibler... Central City... Concord... Jethro... Turners Bend... Vesta... Cecil... Lonelm... Ursula... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 10 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for west central Arkansas.
